response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your business operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and market positioning, this product is valued at $1,000,000 by you, making it a valuable asset for your company. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000, which we believe is a compelling deal considering its immense potential benefits.

This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. By accepting this offer, you will not only secure a high-quality product but also potentially save a significant amount compared to the market value. We are confident that this investment will pay dividends in terms of productivity gains and competitive advantage in your industry.

Please let us know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product or the offer. We are more than happy to provide you with detailed specifications, testimonials from satisfied customers, and a comprehensive overview of how this product can be integrated into your existing systems.

We look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the success of your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
